mapper.select:
select p.prdt_lot, p.prdt_dt, p.prdt_cd, o.prdt_nm, o.prdt_spec, k.indica_no from prdt_stc p join prdt o on p.prdt_cd = o.prdt_cd join indica_d k on p.indica_deta_no=k.indica_deta_no where
TO_CHAR(p.prdt_dt,'yyyyMMdd')>= TO_CHAR(#{startT},'yyyyMMdd') and TO_CHAR(p.prdt_dt,'yyyyMMdd')<= TO_CHAR( #{endT},'yyyyMMdd')
and o.prdt_nm=#{prdNm}
and p.prdt_fg = #{prdSt} and p.prdt_lot not in (select prdt_lot from prdt_stc where prdt_fg ='I')
order by p.prdt_dt asc
